name: holiday cheer mini sweater
notes:
a cute mini sweater that will complement the previously released mini hat and mini mitts patterns. mix and match your colors or try some fun embroidery, the options are endless. happy holidays!

experience level: advanced beginner

materials:
* woolstok (worsted) bundle (100% fine highland wool, 21 mini hanks; 5g/12 yards): 1 bundle (holiday cheer)
* tapestry needle

finished measurements:
circumference: 3”, height: 2½”

color shown:
* cast iron no. 1300
* gravel road no. 1302
* highland fleece no. 1303
* wild thyme no. 1306
* earth ivy no. 1309
* cranberry compote no. 1310
* red rock no. 1315
